review: Great purchase.  We were streaming thru our Wii and this works so much better I'm sorry I waited so long to buy it.  Easy to connect to the TV and works just like playing a DVD and more advantages like not worrying about getting the movie back on time.  You can stop watching for any reason and then start where you left off without a long search.

review: I love it. It does exactly what I need. It gives me a huge list of new and classic television and film to choose from. It allows me to do marathons of entire series. It's easy to use and install and it hooks into my amazon prime so I get tons of free stuff. I wish there was a way to mark something as viewed, but if the worst thing that happens is you view it twice oh well. I do wish it had integration with Showtime. I have DirectTv and they are not yet playing nice together. For a hundred bucks it was a steal. I'm a regular Amazon Prime subscriber so beyond the initial investment, it didn't cost a thing.
